name: Unchained
title: Debanking of the Crypto Industry: Unchained w/ Chris Dixon
text:
Synopsis
The crypto industry is experiencing significant challenges with banking access, to the extent that some companies now require full-time staff dedicated to finding bank accounts for startups.

Key Insights
- Debanking has become a serious issue for crypto startups
- The problem has been ongoing for at least two years
- The challenge is severe enough to require a full-time employee focused solely on finding bank accounts
- Mainstream media (e.g., New York Times) has characterized debanking concerns as a "conspiracy theory"
- The speaker directly contradicts this characterization, suggesting the debanking issue is a real and persistent problem
